About me

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm just a programming nerd that ended up loving data analysis.

I have a PharmD, and a PhD in Epidemiology, and I work as a biostatistician at the Gustave Roussy institute ([CESP Team Oncostat](https://github.com/Oncostat)).
